mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO question (user_id, knowledge_point_id, type, title, options, correct_answer, analysis, difficulty, tags, source, subject) VALUES
(#{item.userId}, #{item.knowledgePointId}, #{item.type}, #{item.title}, #{item.options}, #{item.correctAnswer}, #{item.analysis}, #{item.difficulty}, #{item.tags}, #{item.source}, #{item.subject})
mapper.select: SELECT q.*, kp.subject as subject, kp.name as knowledge_point_name FROM question q LEFT JOIN knowledge_point kp ON q.knowledge_point_id = kp.id WHERE q.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY q.created_at DESC
SELECT q.*, kp.subject as subject, kp.name as knowledge_point_name FROM question q LEFT JOIN knowledge_point kp ON q.knowledge_point_id = kp.id WHERE q.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM question WHERE knowledge_point_id = #{knowledgePointId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM question WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND difficulty = #{difficulty} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET knowledge_point_id = #{knowledgePointId}, type = #{type}, title = #{title}, options = #{options}, correct_answer = #{correctAnswer}, analysis = #{analysis}, difficulty = #{difficulty}, tags = #{tags}, source = #{source}, subject = #{subject} WHERE id = #{id}
